text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that the French company cannot legally act as the EU Exporter under EXW terms for customs purposes. The response explicitly supports this by stating: 'Do NOT declare as IOR yourself\u2014stay EXW-compliant' and structuring the entire solution around insulating the French parent by having a UK IOR Proxy handle the import, effectively confirming the French company should not take on the role of the declarant/IOR in the UK, which is the consequence of the buyer refusing their EXW obligation. Furthermore, the recommended structure places all liability and declaration duties on the UK IOR Proxy, ensuring the French parent remains purely the seller under EXW.", "criterion_id": "cf77364d-885c-4118-9665-e75f304c088a"}
